metadata.title: CVE-2023-4010 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the USB Host Controller Driver framework in the Linuxkernel. The usb_giveback_urb function has a logic loophole in itsimplementation. Due to the inappropriate judgment condition of the gotostatement, the function cannot return under the input of a specificmalformed descriptor file, so it falls into an endless loop, resulting in adenial of service.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
